mapper.select: select a.wxmember_address_id, a.contacts, a.sex, a.contacts_number, a.corporate_name, a.floor_numbe, b.address_name, concat(b.address_name,a.corporate_name,a.floor_numbe) as address from tb_wxmember_address a left join tb_address b on a.address_id=b.address_id where a.wxmember_address_id = #{wxmember_address_id}
